message: The sap.ui.commons.Toolbar class is deprecated since version 1.38. replaced by sap.m.Toolbar
The class "Toolbar" is under the aggregation "footer" and must match the type "IBar"
The sap.ui.commons.Button class is deprecated since version 1.38. replaced by sap.m.Button
The class "Button" is under the aggregation "headerToolbar" and must match the type "Toolbar"
